Dependencies & Housekeeping¶

Project Management¶

Poetry is used for managing the UC API package. Poetry provides a custom installer that will install poetry isolated from the rest of your system by vendorizing its dependencies

Dependecy file for UC API¶

pyproject.toml:

[tool.poetry]
name = "uurnik_connect_api"
version = "1.0"
description = ""
authors = ["Uurnik Systems <talha.javaid@uurnik.com>"]

[tool.poetry.dependencies]
python = "^3.6"
djangorestframework = "3.11.0"
netmiko = "2.4.2"
nornir = "2.4"
django-cors-headers = "^3.4.0"
django-rest-knox = "^4.1.0"
pyarmor = "^6.3.7"
gunicorn = "^20.0.4"

[tool.poetry.dev-dependencies]

[build-system]
requires = ["poetry>=0.12"]
build-backend = "poetry.masonry.api"
